name: Road Tape
description:
As Game Design students, we had to create a car game.

You are a car driver in an dreamlike world. The main goal is to go as fast as possible and as far as you can go before the timer ends. For that, you can catch bonuses that might help you or slow you down.

The team : 

               Lucie CAPDEVILLE : Game Design / Artistic Direction 

              Maxime  DUHAMEL : Game Design / Programming / Sound Design /  Level Design

You can find the .exe below, and if you'd like to help us get better at making games, you can fill the following form after playing !
